title: Fitting In
plot: A teen girl is diagnosed with a reproductive condition that upends her plans to have a sex life, propelling her to explore unusual methods. Her relationships are challenged with everyone in her life, but most importantly, herself.

title: She Is Conann
plot: Conan's life at different stages is shown with a different aesthetic and rhythm from the Sumerian era to the near future.

title: Bushman

title: Disco Boy
plot: After a painful journey through Europe, Aleksei arrives in Paris to join the Foreign Legion. In the Niger Delta, Jomo struggles against the oil companies threatening his village and the lives of his family. One day, at the head of...

title: The Promised Land
plot: The story of Ludvig Kahlen who pursued his lifelong dream: To make the heath bring him wealth and honor.

title: Argylle
plot: An introverted spy novelist is drawn into the activities of a sinister underground syndicate.

title: How to Have Sex
plot: Three British teenage girls go on a rites-of-passage holiday - drinking, clubbing and hooking up, in what should be the best summer of their lives.
award: Nominated for 3 BAFTA 11 wins & 30 nominations total

title: Skin Deep
plot: A womanizing alcoholic writer, whose life seems to be falling apart at the seams, repeatedly finds himself in trouble of one sort or another with the law, ex-girlfriends, and jealous boyfriends.

title: We Are the World
plot: In 1984, British and Irish pop stars united for the cause of Ethiopian famine relief as Band Aid. The following year, the Americans did the same as USA for Africa. This is how it happened.
award: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. 1 win & 2 nominations total
